snippet: BELTRAMI--Michael. The officers, brokers and staff at Brown Harris Stevens will miss our colleague, who was a respected member of the Real Estate Community. Our heartfelt sympathy is extended to his family and friends....
lead_paragraph: BELTRAMI--Michael. The officers, brokers and staff at Brown Harris Stevens will miss our colleague, who was a respected member of the Real Estate Community. Our heartfelt sympathy is extended to his family and friends.
